column2: "Na ɔman no nyinara poon hɔnho hyiae dɛ nyimpa kor kɔr bea tɛtɛr no a ɔwɔ nsu kuropon no enyim no do; na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ kyerɛwfo Ezra dɛ ɔmfa Moses mbra a EWURADZE dze hyɛɛ Israel no mbra."
"Na ɔsɔfo Ezra dze mbra no baa mboanofo no enyim
column4: na hɔn a wobotum dze ntseasee etsie no nyinara
column5: wɔ bosoom a otsia esuon no ne da a odzi kan no mu."

column2: "Na ɔkenkaan mu wɔ bea tɛtɛr no a ɔwɔ Nsu Kuropon no enyim no do fi ahanamakye kodur wigyinae
column4: na hɔn a wobotum atse ase no enyim; na ɔman no nyinara kyɛɛn hɔn aso wɔ mbra nwoma no do."

column2: "Na ɔkyerɛwfo Ezra gyinaa dua asɛnkadaka bi a asɛm no ntsi wɔyɛe no do; na Mattitia
"Na Ezra buee nwoma no mu wɔ ɔman no nyinara enyim; osiandɛ ɔbor ɔman no nyinara do; na obuee mu no

column3: Nyankopɔn kɛse no. Na ɔman no nyinara dze hɔn nsa ne memado gyee do dɛ
column5: Amen: na wɔbobɔɔ hɔn tsir adze
column6: na wɔdze hɔn enyim butubutuuw famu sɔɔr EWURADZE."

column16: maa ɔman no tsee mbra no ase: na ɔman no gyinaa hɔn ananmu."

column3: wɔ Nyankopɔn ne mbra no mu

column5: na Levifo a wɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ ɔman no
column7: Ndɛ da yi ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn ma EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn; mma hom nndzi nkɔmbɔ
column8: na wonnsusu so. Osiandɛ ɔman no nyinara sui wɔ aber a wɔtsee mbra no mu nsɛm no."

column6: na wɔmfa bi nkɛma nyia woennsiesie hwee amma no no: osiandɛ ndɛ da yi yɛ krɔnkrɔn ma hɛn EWURADZE: nkyii so mma hom nnhow hom werɛ; na EWURADZE n'enyigye nye hom ahoɔdzen."

column2: "Nna Levifo no dwedwee ɔman no nyinara
column5: na da yi yɛ krɔnkrɔn; nkyii so mma hom werɛ nnhow."

column2: "Na ɔman no nyinara sii mu kɔr hɔn kwan kedzidzii
column6: osiandɛ wɔtsee nsɛm a wɔdaa no edzi kyerɛɛ hɔn no ase."

column3: ɔman no nyinara mu egyanom efiefi etsitsir
column4: na Levifo no boaboaa hɔn ano kɔr kyerɛwfo Ezra nkyɛn
column5: dɛ ɔmma wɔntse mbra no ase."

column2: "Na wohun dɛ wɔakyerɛw no wɔ mbra no mu
column3: mbrɛ EWURADZE sii na ɔnam Moses do hyɛe
column4: dɛ Israelmba no ntsenatsena mpata mu wɔ bosoom a otsia esuon no mu afahyɛ no mu:"

column2: "na dɛ wɔmma ɔntahye na wɔmbɔ no dawur wɔ hɔn nkurow nyinara mu
column5: Hom mpue nkɔ bepɔw no do
obiara wɔ ne dan etsifi na hɔn abanguado
column7: na nsu kuropon ho bea tɛtɛr no do."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔsanee fi ndɔmmumkɔ mu bae no mu mboanofo no nyinara bobɔɔ mpata
column3: na wɔtsenatsenaa mpata no mu: osiandɛ ofitsi Nun ba Jesua ne nda do dze bodu da no Israelmba nnyɛɛ dɛm da. Na enyigye kɛsenara sii hɔ."

column2: "Eso ɔkenkaan Nyankopɔn mbra nwoma no mu daa daa
column3: ofi da a odzi kan no do dze bodur da a odzi ekyir no do. Na wɔhyɛɛ fa no nda esuon; na da a otsia awɔtwe no yɛ ehyiadzi krɔnkrɔn
